name: The Woocatcher
description:
A GMTK Gamejam Game by Rene Derks

Oldskool arcade action: One-dimensional movement and a single-button mechanic. Collect that Hiscore, one point at a time. Defend Planet 42 and your lovely buddy from the onslaught from space. Inspired by Missile Command, Subspace and Paratrooper.

Music with Novation Launchpad (iOS)
Audio with BFXR

Particles: Jean Moreno - Cartoon FX
Skybox: Wello Soft - Skyboxes
Font: Serge Shi - Typeface Adec
